alert.note: Alert for Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; Logan County; Morgan County; North and Northeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, North Lincoln County; Northeast Weld County; Phillips County; Sedgwick County; Southeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, South Lincoln County; Washington County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 01 at 2:36AM MST until December 02 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING THROUGH FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * WHERE...Briggsdale, Fort Morgan, Byers, Limon, Southern Lincoln County, Sterling, Akron, Julesburg, and Holyoke. * WHEN...From Friday morning through Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and scattered power outages may result. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Blowing dust is possible, reducing visibilities and making travel hazardous.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
